Title: Project A 2
Writer: Jackie Chan, Edward Tang, Yu Ting
Actors: Jackie Chan, Maggie Cheung, Rosamund Kwan
Plot: Dragon is now transferred to be the police head of Sai Wan district, and has to contend with a gangster kingpin, anti-Manchu revolutionaries, some runaway pirates, Manchu Loyalists and a corrupt Police Superintendent.
